---
title: "Exploring_Data"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(CASdatasets)
data("auscathist")
aus_data = auscathist
head(aus_data)
```

```{r}
summary(aus_data)
```

```{r}
colnames(aus_data)
dim(aus_data)
```

```{r}
sapply(aus_data,function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```

```{r}
library(Amelia)
missmap(aus_data, main = "Missing values vs observed")
```

```{r}
aus_data$LastDay = NULL
n = ncol(aus_data)
for(i in 1:n){
  aus_data = subset(aus_data, !is.na(aus_data[,i]))
}
dim(aus_data)
```

```{r}
library(Amelia)
missmap(aus_data, main = "Missing values vs observed")
```
```{r}
str(aus_data)
```
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(DataExplorer)
DataExplorer::create_report(aus_data)
```
